titles.title: For the relief of Mrs. Florence Narusewicz of Erie, Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 108-776.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 6.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
By request of Mr. Coble the House passed over the measure without prejudice.

bill.summary: 2/11/2003--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay a specified sum to Florence Narusewicz, which represents the amount of an award for a disability incurred by her husband during active military service in World War II.
